title: The overwhelming number of bots in Coop vs AI games
body:
I think its time for Riot to stop putting all its effort into punishing people that called someone else a poopy head and tackle the real problems in league. Such as the overwhelming number of Botting accounts in Coop vs AI games. I usually play this game mode to test out my ping, but recently I have come to notice a distinct pattern of gameplay and naming of my teammates. I have noticed that a large major a normal name (Bob, mike, peter, raphael) followed by 4-5 numbers. However Some are sneaky, like my third teammate Peter PK Neil, who played exactly the same as the other bot. He only walked down the middle of the lane right into the turrets over and over and over. 

I posted my post match screen, Im not entirely sure if the don't name and shame rule applies to bots. Im tired of always reporting bots and playing a game with them a week later. Its time Riot did something about this.

replies.body: I'm originally from NA and I've been trying to level up my summoner on OCE to play with my aussie friends. I just now had a Co-Op match with 4 botter teammates. Was the first time on OCE out of 16 games of co-op that I've lost. most co-op games have at least 2 botters. Is the OCE server just being ignored? Not enough staff to ban all the botter accounts?  (this wouldn't surprise me as there are probably thousands)

It's the same in NA bro I had a game where 3 of my team are bots. 2 are poorly coded 1 is on par with an intermediate bot. And the worse thing is that when you try to post on boards how rampant these botters are Riot deletes your thread.
I think the Singed is just new, other then that 100% agree with you
there are so many "PK" middle name players who all suck, they're bots.
In a game mode that you only play to 'test your ping', why is this 'the real problems in league'?

I have had 4 games against bots, 1 of those had zero bots, 1 had two and the other 2 had one each. They seriously need to be weeded out.
(although them not flaming is pretty nice, but playing like a toddler isn't)
Yeah, I ued to just play the bot games without interacting with my team. But that particular game I was hitting 8k ms and It gave me the time to properly analyse my teammates.
these guys are probably new to the game hence why they are  playing bots
